<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable / disable showing of in-game UI during currently active camera effect. By default the HUD is off, which will make results of [[drawIcon3D]] invisible, for example.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''cameraEffectEnableHUD''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[cameraEffectEnableHUD]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showHUD]], [[shownMap]], [[visibleMap]], [[forceMap]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownWatch]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownUAVFeed]], [[camCreate]], [[cameraEffect]]
</value></part></template>
